body:
The Ultimate Guide to Public Desire Shoes: Honest Reviews, Styling Tips & Buying Guide 2024

After three years of wearing, collecting, and reviewing Public Desire shoes, I'm sharing my complete insider's guide to this trendy footwear brand. From sizing secrets to styling tips, discover everything you need to know before making your purchase. For more fashion insights and outdoor adventure gear, visit our homepage.

Table of Contents

  • My Personal Journey with Public Desire Shoes
  • Complete Brand Overview: What Makes Public Desire Special
  • Honest Reviews: Quality, Comfort & Durability Analysis
  • Sizing Guide & Fit Tips from Real Experience
  • Style Guide: How to Rock Public Desire Shoes
  • Best Public Desire Shoes Worth Your Money
  • Conclusion

My Personal Journey with Public Desire Shoes

Three years ago, I stumbled upon Public Desire shoes through a friend's Instagram story. She was wearing these stunning barely-there heels that looked expensive but cost less than my usual coffee budget for the week. That moment sparked my journey with public desire shoes that has led to owning over 20 pairs and becoming somewhat of an expert on the brand.

My first purchase was a pair of their signature stiletto heels in nude – a classic choice that I still wear regularly today. What impressed me immediately wasn't just the price point, but how these shoes photographed. The clean lines, the attention to detail in the straps, and the way they elongated my legs made them an instant favorite.

During my first winter with public desire shoes, I discovered their boot collection. Living in Chicago, I needed something that could handle both style and function. Their knee-high boots became my go-to for everything from dinner dates to weekend shopping trips. The versatility surprised me – these weren't just Instagram-worthy shoes, they were genuinely wearable.

Over the years, I've learned the ins and outs of this brand. I've experienced the highs of finding the perfect pair that becomes a wardrobe staple, and the occasional disappointment when sizing runs different than expected. I've walked miles in their various shoe styles and have the honest insights to share.

Personal Tip: Start with one classic style in a neutral color. This gives you a chance to understand the brand's fit and quality before building your collection.

Complete Brand Overview: What Makes Public Desire Special

Public Desire emerged from Manchester in 2014, founded by four brothers who recognized a gap in the affordable fashion footwear market. Unlike established brands that focus on traditional styles, public desire shoes carved out their niche by creating Instagram-ready designs at accessible price points.

The Brand Philosophy

What sets Public Desire apart is their commitment to trend-led design without the luxury price tag. They're not trying to compete with Louboutin or Jimmy Choo on quality – instead, they're providing fashionable alternatives that let style-conscious individuals experiment with trends without breaking the bank. This philosophy resonates particularly well with younger consumers who value both style and financial responsibility.

The brand has built its reputation on social media marketing, collaborating with influencers and fashion bloggers to showcase their designs. This approach has created a community around public desire shoes where customers share styling tips and outfit inspiration. Their Instagram account (@publicdesire) boasts millions of followers who actively engage with new releases and styling content.

Product Range and Specialties

Public Desire has expanded beyond their original heel-focused catalog to include ankle boots, knee-high boots, platform shoes, and even clothing lines. However, their core strength remains in statement heels and boots. Popular categories include barely-there sandals, chunky platform boots, and western-inspired ankle boots that align with current fashion trends.

The brand particularly excels in creating shoes that photograph well for social media. The clean lines, strategic color choices, and proportion-enhancing designs make their products highly shareable. This isn't accidental – it's a deliberate design strategy that has fueled their viral marketing success.

Shop Similar Styles on Amazon

Honest Reviews: Quality, Comfort & Durability Analysis

After wearing dozens of pairs over three years, I have a realistic perspective on what public desire shoes deliver versus what they promise. Let me break down the key areas where they excel and where they fall short.

Build Quality Assessment

The construction quality of public desire shoes is exactly what you'd expect for the price point – decent but not exceptional. The materials are primarily synthetic, which keeps costs down but affects breathability and long-term durability. However, the stitching is generally solid, and I've rarely experienced structural failures within the first year of regular wear.

Where the brand shines is in the details that matter for photos and special occasions. The hardware on strappy sandals feels substantial, the finishes are clean, and the proportions are carefully calculated to be flattering. For shoes that cost $30-80, this attention to aesthetic detail is impressive.

Pros

  • Excellent value for trendy designs
  • Extensive size range including wide fits
  • Regular sales and promotions
  • Instagram-worthy aesthetics
  • Good customer service experience

Cons

  • Synthetic materials limit breathability
  • Inconsistent sizing across styles
  • Limited arch support for all-day wear
  • International shipping can be expensive
  • Durability varies by style

Real User Experiences

Customer Review Summary #1 - Amazon Verified Purchase

"I ordered the black stiletto ankle boots for a night out. The quality exceeded my expectations for the price point. They were comfortable enough for dancing, though I wouldn't wear them for extended walking. The sizing was true to my usual US size. Highly recommend for special occasions!"

4/5 stars

Customer Review Summary #2 - Reddit r/femalefashionadvice

"Been buying from Public Desire for two years now. The boots are definitely better quality than the sandals. I size up half a size for comfort and it works perfectly. My knee-high boots have held up surprisingly well with regular wear. Just don't expect luxury – know what you're getting for the price."

4/5 stars

Customer Review Summary #3 - Trustpilot Verified

"Mixed experience with Public Desire shoes. The heels I ordered were gorgeous and perfect for photos, but started showing wear after about 6 months of occasional use. Customer service was helpful when I had a sizing issue. Good for trend pieces but invest elsewhere for everyday shoes."

3/5 stars
Find Quality Alternatives on Amazon

Sizing Guide & Fit Tips from Real Experience

One of the most challenging aspects of ordering public desire shoes online is getting the sizing right. After years of trial and error, I've developed a system that works 90% of the time. Here's everything I wish I knew before my first order.

Understanding Public Desire Sizing

Public Desire uses UK sizing as their standard, which can be confusing for US customers. Their size conversion isn't always consistent with other brands, so relying solely on their size chart can lead to disappointment. I've found that public desire shoes typically run about half a size smaller than brands like Nike or Adidas, but close to true-to-size compared to other fashion shoe brands.

The fit also varies significantly between shoe styles. Pointed-toe heels tend to run smaller and narrower, while their platform boots often have more generous sizing. Their boot collection generally offers more forgiveness in fit compared to their precision-cut heels.

Sizing Reality Check

Don't assume your usual size will work across all Public Desire styles. I wear a US 8 in most brands, but my Public Desire collection ranges from UK 6 to UK 7 depending on the specific shoe design and intended fit.

My Proven Sizing Strategy

For Heels & Sandals

  • Order your true UK size for strappy styles
  • Size up 0.5 for pointed toes
  • Consider foot width – go up if you have wider feet
  • Check recent reviews for style-specific feedback

For Boots & Closed Shoes

  • Go with your normal UK size for ankle boots
  • Consider calf width for knee-high styles
  • Allow room for thicker socks in winter boots
  • Wide-fit options are genuinely wider, not just longer

For those new to public desire shoes, I recommend starting with their wide-fit options if you're between sizes. The additional width often provides the comfort needed for longer wear, and you can always add heel grips or toe pads for minor adjustments. Their wide-fit shoe selection has expanded significantly over the past year.

Shop Comfortable Wide-Fit Options

Style Guide: How to Rock Public Desire Shoes

The beauty of public desire shoes lies in their versatility and trend-forward designs. Over the years, I've discovered styling combinations that maximize their impact and create outfits that look far more expensive than they actually are.

Daytime Chic Combinations

For daytime looks, I pair their platform ankle boots with high-waisted jeans and oversized blazers. This combination strikes the perfect balance between comfort and style. The chunky sole adds height while remaining walkable, and the clean lines complement both casual and smart-casual outfits.

Their mid-heel options work beautifully with midi dresses and tailored trousers. I've found that public desire shoes in neutral tones like nude, black, or tan can anchor an outfit while letting other elements shine. This is particularly effective when incorporating other trendy pieces from brands like premium designer collections.

Evening Glamour Techniques

Evening styling is where Public Desire truly excels. Their barely-there heels create leg-lengthening magic that rivals much more expensive brands. I pair these with bodycon dresses or tailored separates for special occasions. The key is choosing styles that complement your leg shape rather than fighting against it.

For formal events, I've learned that their satin-finish shoes photograph beautifully under artificial lighting. Combined with strategic styling choices inspired by luxury heel collections, you can create looks that appear far more expensive than the actual investment.

Seasonal Styling Strategies

During Chicago winters, I've mastered the art of transitioning public desire shoes through seasons. Their over-the-knee boots paired with oversized sweaters and mini skirts create a cozy-chic aesthetic that works for everything from brunch dates to holiday parties. The key is layering and choosing styles that can handle both indoor and outdoor environments.

Summer styling focuses on their sandal collection. I've found that their platform sandals work beautifully with flowy dresses and denim pieces. The elevated sole provides comfort for walking while maintaining the glamorous aesthetic that makes these shoes Instagram-worthy.

Pro Styling Tip

Invest in quality basics and use Public Desire shoes as statement pieces. A simple black dress becomes runway-worthy with the right pair of their heels, while classic jeans get elevated with their trendy boot styles.

Complete Your Look with Accessories

Best Public Desire Shoes Worth Your Money

After testing dozens of styles, certain public desire shoes consistently outperform others in terms of comfort, durability, and versatility. Here are my top recommendations based on real-world wear testing and value analysis.

Must-Have Heel Styles

The barely-there stiletto sandals remain their crown jewel. These shoes have carried me through countless events, from rooftop parties to wedding receptions. The ankle strap provides security while the minimal design creates an elongating effect that's incredibly flattering. At around $45, they deliver exceptional value compared to similar styles from luxury brands.

Their block heel collection deserves special mention for comfort. I can wear these for 6-8 hours without significant discomfort, making them perfect for long events or workdays when you need to look polished. The wider heel base provides stability while maintaining the sophisticated silhouette that makes public desire shoes so photogenic.

Top Boot Recommendations

Knee-High Block Heel Boots

Perfect for transitional weather, these boots work with everything from mini dresses to wide-leg trousers. The block heel provides comfort for all-day wear, while the sleek silhouette keeps them current with fashion trends.

Investment Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Platform Ankle Boots

These offer the height of a heel with the stability of a boot. I've walked through city streets and stood for hours at events in these without issue. They pair beautifully with both skinny and wide-leg jeans.

Investment Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

For those exploring similar aesthetic choices, consider brands featured in our affordable boot collection which includes comparable alternatives at different price points.

Seasonal Investment Pieces

Summer calls for their platform sandals, which I consider the best value in their entire collection. These shoes have survived beach vacations, city walking tours, and countless dinner dates. The platform sole provides surprising comfort, while the design details keep them looking expensive.

Winter demands their over-the-knee boots, though these require careful styling to avoid looking costume-like. When done right, they create dramatic silhouettes that work beautifully for special occasions and fashion-forward everyday looks. The key is choosing neutral colors and pairing with fitted bottoms.

Browse Similar Styles on Amazon

Frequently Asked Questions

Are Public Desire shoes true to size?

Public Desire sizing tends to run about half a size smaller than typical US brands. Based on my extensive testing, I recommend ordering half a size up for pointed-toe styles and sticking to your usual UK size for boots and block heels. Their wide-fit options are genuinely wider, not just longer, making them excellent for those with broader feet. Always check recent customer reviews for specific styles, as sizing can vary between different shoe designs within their collection.

How is the quality compared to other affordable shoe brands?

Public Desire offers solid quality for the price point, particularly excelling in aesthetic details and construction finishing. While they primarily use synthetic materials, the stitching is generally reliable and hardware feels substantial. Compared to similar fast-fashion shoe brands, they invest more in design details that matter for photos and special occasions. However, don't expect the same durability as leather shoes from established footwear brands. For occasional wear and trendy styles, the quality justifies the price.

Can you wear Public Desire shoes for extended periods?

Comfort varies significantly by style within the Public Desire range. Their block heels and platform styles can handle 6-8 hours of wear with minimal discomfort, while stilettos are best reserved for special occasions lasting 2-4 hours. The boots generally offer the most comfort for extended wear. I recommend breaking in new shoes gradually and consider adding cushioned insoles for all-day events. Their wide-fit options provide additional comfort for longer wear periods.

What's the return policy and international shipping like?

Public Desire offers a 30-day return window, though customers are responsible for return shipping costs from the US, which can be expensive (around $25-30). They do process refunds relatively quickly once items are received. International shipping typically takes 7-14 business days and costs $10-15 depending on order value. During sales periods, shipping may take longer. I recommend ordering multiple sizes for important events and returning what doesn't fit, factoring in the return shipping cost.

Are there any celebrity endorsements or collaborations?

Public Desire has been spotted on numerous celebrities and influencers, including Bella Hadid, Katy Perry, and various Love Island contestants. They regularly collaborate with social media influencers for limited collections and styling partnerships. While they don't have major celebrity endorsement deals like luxury brands, their organic celebrity wear has significantly boosted their credibility and social media presence. Many of their viral styles originate from celebrity sightings or influencer collaborations.

How do Public Desire shoes hold up over time?

Longevity depends heavily on usage frequency and shoe style. With occasional wear (1-2 times monthly), most Public Desire shoes maintain good condition for 1-2 years. Daily wear will show signs after 6-9 months, particularly in high-stress areas like heel tips and toe boxes. Their boots generally outlast sandals and heels due to sturdier construction. For the price point, durability is reasonable, but consider them fashion pieces rather than investment footwear. Regular maintenance like heel tip replacement can extend their lifespan significantly.

Conclusion

After three years of collecting, wearing, and analyzing public desire shoes, I can confidently say they fill a unique niche in the footwear market. They're not trying to be luxury shoes, nor are they competing with comfort-focused brands. Instead, they offer trend-forward designs at accessible prices for fashion-conscious individuals who want to experiment with styles without significant financial commitment.

The brand excels at creating Instagram-worthy shoes that photograph beautifully and elevate outfits for special occasions. Their attention to aesthetic details, from hardware finishes to proportion calculations, rivals much more expensive brands. However, managing expectations around durability and comfort is crucial for satisfaction.

My recommendation is to approach public desire shoes as fashion accessories rather than everyday footwear investments. They're perfect for building a trend-focused shoe collection, experimenting with styles before investing in luxury versions, or creating statement looks for social media and special events.

Ready to Start Your Public Desire Journey?

Use the insights from this guide to make informed choices and build a collection that works for your lifestyle and budget.

Start Shopping Similar Styles

For those exploring other affordable fashion footwear options, consider browsing our related guides on trendy boot styles and comfortable heel alternatives. Building a versatile shoe collection involves understanding the strengths and limitations of each brand, and Public Desire certainly has earned its place in the affordable fashion footwear landscape.
